actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.
Committee on Finance requested executive comment from OMB, International Trade Commission, Office of the U.S. Trade Representative, Treasury Department, State Department, Commerce Department.

official_title: A bill to amend the Tariff Act of 1930 regarding same condition drawbacks and same kind and quality drawbacks, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Amends the Tariff Act of 1930 to provide for the refund ("drawback") of any import duty, tax, or fee which was imposed on imported merchandise if merchandise of the same kind and quality: (1) is, within three years, exported or destroyed under Customs supervision; and (2) is not used within the United States before such exportation or destruction. Provides for the same kind of refund treatment for packaging material imported for use in performing incidental operations with regard to the packaging or repackaging of imported merchandise.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Tariff Act of 1930 regarding same condition drawbacks and same kind and quality drawbacks, and for other purposes.
